articles.description: You can make a big Black Friday saving on the compact Sonos Beam soundbar, the Sonos Move portable Bluetooth speaker and the Sonos One
articles.content:
Forget Black Friday, in 2020 it's Black Friday Week! And that means the Black Friday sales have well and truly started.
Sonos is getting in on the act with deals on the Sonos Beam soundbar, Sonos Mo… [+2201 chars]
